description: Model detailing available configuration options for plaintext_local.

PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_CHECKIN_FREQUENCY.description: The frequency with which to check for new messages.
PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_CHECKIN_FREQUENCY.title: Plaintext Local Checkin Frequency

PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_INBOX_DIR.description: The location to expect incoming messages in.
PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_INBOX_DIR.title: Plaintext Local Inbox Dir

PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_OUTBOX_DIR.description: The location to send outgoing messages to.
PLAINTEXT_LOCAL_OUTBOX_DIR.title: Plaintext Local Outbox Dir

title: PlaintextLocalConfig
